description.@en: From the skies above, burning stars rain down on your enemies.

effect.@en: After successfully casting this spell, select a number of foes equal to your [WB]. Providing you can see your foes, each foe suffers [[/roll 3D10]]+[WB] in Damage. In addition, if your foes fail to Resist with a Coordination Test, they are knocked Prone.

criticalSuccess.@en: As above, but your foes cannot Resist this Magick.

criticalFailure.@en: The meteoric rod suddenly cracks and breaks. With a roaring thunder overhead, a searing iron meteor strikes you from above. You suffer [[/roll 3D10]]+[WB] in Damage and are knocked Prone.

reagents.@en: A rod of meteoric iron, held aloft
